title: P. J. (1967) George Peppard · Gayle Hunnicutt

sources.title: P. J. (1967) George Peppard · Gayle Hunnicutt
sources.description: A down-and-out private detective is hired by a wealthy egotist as a bodyguard for his supposedly endangered lover and is tricked into murdering an unwelcome employee.   While not unoriginal in its subject matter, the film is conventional in its style.
